pr_title: Add a HTTP/2 client example using the newer frames approach...

timeline.message: Add a HTTP/2 client example using the newer frames approach. The current HTTP/2 client example uses the older 'HTTP/1 <--> HTTP/2' translation approach.

timeline.author: normanmaurer

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/example/src/main/java/io/netty/example/http2/helloworld/frame/client/Http2ClientFrameInitializer.java b/example/src/main/java/io/netty/example/http2/helloworld/frame/client/Http2ClientFrameInitializer.java
index 5bf624d6bd..b08111fabb 100644
--- a/example/src/main/java/io/netty/example/http2/helloworld/frame/client/Http2ClientFrameInitializer.java
+++ b/example/src/main/java/io/netty/example/http2/helloworld/frame/client/Http2ClientFrameInitializer.java

@@ -1,5 +1,5 @@

timeline.bodyText: in other examples we usually inject the SslContext if ssl should be used and so build it in the main method. Consider doing this here as well to keep it consistent.
timeline.author: normanmaurer
